name: slowbronite
effect: Held: Allows Slowbro to Mega Evolve into Mega Slowbro.
short_effect: Held: Allows Slowbro to Mega Evolve into Mega Slowbro.

flavor_text.sword_shield: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones. Have Slowbro hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
